NK087(shu)007:1: // a nu yo ga lung bdun gyi sgo nas 'chad
NK087(shu)007:2: tshul zung 'jug grub pa'i rna rgyan ces bya ba
NK087(shu)007:3: bzhugs so // rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab
NK087(shu)007:4: bdag dpal ldan bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal
NK087(shu)007:6: bdag rgyud smin grol la 'god par mdzad du gsol /
NK087(shu)007:7: 'dir gsang sngags kyi theg pa rgyud sde bzhir grags
NK087(shu)007:8: pa'i nang tshan bla med kyi rgyud las pha ma
NK087(shu)007:9: gnyis med kyi rgyud gsum las snga 'gyur rang skad
NK087(shu)007:10: la yo ga rnam gsum zhes grags pa de'i 'chad
NK087(shu)007:11: thabs la rgyud ma h+aa yo ga rgyan bdun dang
NK087(shu)007:12: / a nu yo ga lung bdun /
NK087(shu)007:13: a ti yo ga spyi don rnam drug gi sgo nas so sor 'chad par bshad pa las /
NK087(shu)007:14: 'dir a nu yo ga lung bdun gyi sgo nas 'chad tshul cung zad phye na /
NK087(shu)007:15: he ru ka gal po'i rgyud las /
NK087(shu)007:16: snang srid ye sangs rgyas pa lta ba'i lung //
NK087(shu)007:17: lha sku phyag rgyar gsal ba bskyed rim lung //
NK087(shu)007:18: bzlas brjod bsnyen par 'bad pa sngags kyi lung //
NK087(shu)007:19: chos dbyings yum du rol pa sbyor ba'i lung //
NK087(shu)007:20: zhing bcu rtsad nas gcod pa sgrol ba'i lung //
NK087(shu)007:21: tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhal zas mchod pa'i lung //
NK087(shu)007:22: dbang bskur dngos grub len pa sgrub chen lung //
NK087(shu)007:25: snang srid ye sangs rgyas pa lta ba'i lung //
NK087(shu)007:26: zhes sems nyid kyi ngo bo ye gdod ma nas
NK087(shu)007:27: sangs rgyas su gnas pa de nyid lhan skyes ma
NK087(shu)007:28: rig pas bsgrib nas kun brtags ma rig pas phyogs
NK087(shu)007:29: su bcad pa'i gzung 'dzin gyi snang bas phyi rol
NK087(shu)007:30: du yul snang bzang ngan sna tshogs su srid pa
NK087(shu)007:31: 'di dag kyang nges don du brtags na bden gnyis
NK087(shu)007:32: kyi don la dngos por 'dzin pa'i cha shas rdul
NK087(shu)007:33: phran tsam yang ma grub par rang rang gi ngo
NK087(shu)007:35: kun rdzob las ni logs shig la //
NK087(shu)007:36: don dam nyer bar ma dmigs dang //
NK087(shu)007:37: stong nyid gang yin kun rdzob la //
NK087(shu)007:38: kun rdzob gang yin stong nyid do //
NK087(shu)007:40: yum las rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bden pa'am rdzun pa gang du'ang med de /
NK087(shu)007:41: rang bzhin gyi ngo bo ni med pa'i phyir dang /
NK087(shu)007:44: snang bas gang yang ma grub nyams pa tsam yang ma dmigs te //
NK087(shu)007:46: rtag dang chad pa 'di yang mtha' yin te //
NK087(shu)007:47: yod dang med ces bya ba gnyis ka mtha' //gang yang gnyis po dag ni mi shes nas //
NK087(shu)007:48: mkhas pas dbus la'ang gnas par mi bya'o //
NK087(shu)007:50: klu sgrub kyis dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin /
NK087(shu)007:51: zhes pas don dam spros bral rang byung gi ye
NK087(shu)007:52: shes ni gshis gang du'ang ma grub kyang rtsal sna
NK087(shu)007:53: tshogs su snang ba yod med spros pa'i sgro skur
NK087(shu)007:55: ye nas sangas rgyas kyi snying po 'khor 'das kun gyi ngo bor bzhugs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)007:57: bcings med rnam pa grol med pa //
NK087(shu)007:58: ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos //
NK087(shu)007:60: sring gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing //
NK087(shu)007:61: sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos //
NK087(shu)007:62: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do //
NK087(shu)007:63: zhes gsungs pas dus gsum gyi rgyal ba kun gyi
NK087(shu)007:64: thugs kyi bzhed phug lta ba bla na med pa
NK087(shu)007:65: yin te / snga mar 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med //
NK087(shu)007:68: lha sku phyag rgyar gsal ba'i bskyed rim lung /
NK087(shu)007:69: zhes pa de ltar gang du lta ba gtan la
NK087(shu)007:70: phabs nas bsgom pas nyams su len thabs ni lha
NK087(shu)007:71: bsgoms pa ste / a b+hi d+ha na las /
NK087(shu)007:72: mi 'chi dpa' dang lhag par bstan //
NK087(shu)007:73: 'dod don ster dang zhi ba dang //
NK087(shu)007:74: lus gnas phan pa grub pa dang //
NK087(shu)007:75: bkur bar 'os phyir lha zhes bya //
NK087(shu)007:76: zhes pas de la'ang 'das ma 'das kyi mtshams gnyis las 'dir ni ye shes kyi lha yin te /
NK087(shu)007:77: lha de'i ngo bo chos sku las ma g.yos bzhin
NK087(shu)007:78: gdul bya mchog dman gyi ngor gzugs sku longs sprul
NK087(shu)007:79: rnam par bzhengs pa de nyid rnal 'byor pas rang
NK087(shu)007:80: rig rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa'i brda'i phyag rgyar
NK087(shu)007:81: phan tshun rgyar thebs par byas nas sgom don /
NK087(shu)007:84: sbyong 'bras kyi don la mos pa rtse gcig pas gasla btab cing bskyed rim sgom pa ste /
NK087(shu)007:85: de lta bsgom pa'i yon tan yang /
NK087(shu)007:86: rgyal po lung bstan rdo rjes /
NK087(shu)007:87: lha yi sku ni gsal bsgom na //
NK087(shu)007:88: bsod nams tshogs chen thob par 'gyur //
NK087(shu)007:89: de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na //
NK087(shu)007:90: ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par 'gyur //
NK087(shu)007:93: bzlas brjod bsnyen par 'bad pa sngags kyi lung //
NK087(shu)007:94: zhes bskyed rim gyis lus lha skur smin nas gsung
NK087(shu)007:95: rdo rjer dag byed bzlas pa la 'jug ste lha
NK087(shu)007:96: sngags de nyid ma yengs par yang yang bzlas shing
NK087(shu)007:97: / de nyid ngag gi brjod pa dang /
NK087(shu)007:98: brjod bral gnyis kyi sgo nas rab tu bsnyen cing
NK087(shu)007:99: rtse gcig tu 'abda dgos pa nyid snod min la
NK087(shu)007:100: gsang ste rang gis legs par sngags pa'i don te
NK087(shu)007:101: / lung gi sgo bzhi'i nang nas thugs dam gnad bskul gsang ba sngags kyi sgo /
NK087(shu)007:106: skye med rdo rje'i bzlas pa sogs bya zhing /
NK087(shu)007:107: ngag gi bzlas pa la skyon bcu spangs te /
NK087(shu)007:108: bar ma chad du bzlas pa ngag bzlas /
NK087(shu)007:109: lce mchu'i sbyor ba la ma ltos par gsang sngags yid la ma yengs par dran pa yid bzlas /
NK087(shu)007:110: rlung gi 'gro 'ong dang bstun te 'bru gsum sgrar
NK087(shu)007:111: bcas su bzla ba brdar gyur rdo rje'i bzlas pa
NK087(shu)007:112: / ma yengs ma yengs g.yeng bar mi 'gyur bar
NK087(shu)007:113: gnas lugs spros pa dang bral ba nam mkha' lta
NK087(shu)007:114: bu'i ngang nas lus ngag gi brjod pa dang bral
NK087(shu)007:115: bar bzla ba skye med rdo rje'i bzlas pa rdo
NK087(shu)007:116: / rje'i rnams so // bzhi pa ni /
NK087(shu)007:117: chos dbyings yum dang rol pa sbyor ba'i lung //
NK087(shu)007:118: zhes ngag rlung gsung rdo rjer dag nas /
NK087(shu)007:119: yid chos thugs rdo rjer smin byed rdzogs pa'i rim
NK087(shu)007:120: pa ste srid zhi'i mthar zhen gyi rnam rtog gi
NK087(shu)007:121: chosa rnams 'khor 'das mnyam nyid mkha' dbyingsa spros bral
NK087(shu)007:122: gyi klong / rgyal ba kun gyi yum du gyur
NK087(shu)007:123: pa ste de nyid dang 'du 'bral med par rtag
NK087(shu)007:124: tu rol zhing rtogs goms kyi sbyor bas gdod ma'i
NK087(shu)007:125: gtan srid zin par byed pa la /
NK087(shu)007:126: bshad tshul mang yang 'dir dbang bzhi dang sbyar nas bshad par /
NK087(shu)007:127: snang ba thabs kyi rang bzhin stong cha shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
NK087(shu)007:128: snang stong so so ma yin tha mi dad du bsgom pas bum dbang gi rtogs pa bskyed /
NK087(shu)007:129: ngag gi rlung 'gro 'ong brjod pa thabs kyi rang bzhin la /
NK087(shu)007:130: de'i ngo bo grags tsam nyid nas mtshan mar ma grub pa'i phyir shes rab ste /
NK087(shu)007:131: grags stong dbyer med gzhi bral n+aa da'i dbyings su sbyor bas gsang dbang gi rtog pa skyed /
NK087(shu)007:132: dbu ma'i mar snar shes rab kyi nyi ma a thung 'bar ba'i me drod kyis /
NK087(shu)007:133: spyi bo thabs mchog ham yig gi zla ba bdud rtsir zhu ba na bde ba gnyis zhen bral /
NK087(shu)007:134: stong nyid du rgyas thebs pas bde stong gnyis med
NK087(shu)007:135: zag bral lam la brten nas sher dbang gi rtog
NK087(shu)007:136: pa bskyed / snang rig 'gyu gsum gyi rtog pa thams cad thabs yin la /
NK087(shu)007:137: de nyid don dam spros bral bde ba chen por
NK087(shu)007:139: ba kun dang bral te rig stong chos sku'i shes
NK087(shu)007:140: rab kyi bog thon pas bzhi pa'i rtog pa bskyed
NK087(shu)007:141: par byed pa'o // lnga pa ni /
NK087(shu)007:142: zhing bcu rtsad nas gcod pa sgrol ba'i lung zhes
NK087(shu)007:143: pa rang gi lus ngag yid tha mal pa de
NK087(shu)007:144: nyid rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rjer
NK087(shu)007:145: byang chub pas gzhan don phrin las kyis 'gro ba
NK087(shu)007:147: bsgral ba'i zhing gnyis 'dzin 'khrul snang la rnam rtog gi dbye na bcos te /
NK087(shu)007:148: dgrar gnyen ltar snang ba'i gnod byed du gyur pa gtso cher /
NK087(shu)007:149: zhing bcu ste mi yi 'gro ba bdun dang /
NK087(shu)007:150: ngan song gsum bsnan pas bcu yin la /
NK087(shu)007:151: de rnams 'khor bar skye 'gyur gyi rtsa ba rtsad
NK087(shu)007:152: nas yongs su gcoda pa nyid srid pa las sgrol
NK087(shu)007:153: ba'i thabs yin pa gang zhig /sems can gyi blo
NK087(shu)007:154: yi rim pa dang bstun nas phrin las bzhi gang
NK087(shu)007:156: 'dir drag po mngon spyod skabs su 'brel ba'i dbang du byas na /
NK087(shu)007:157: rdzong 'phrang srog gsum dang ldan pa ste /
NK087(shu)007:158: rnal 'byor pa stong nyid snying rje zung du 'jug
NK087(shu)007:159: pa'i lta ba rang byan tshun pas kun slong zhing
NK087(shu)007:160: bcu sgrol ba'i zhe sdang ldan pa ni lta ba'i
NK087(shu)007:161: rdzong / rdzas sngags tshang zhing gsal ba gsum dang
NK087(shu)007:162: ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang kha sbyor dbye ba'i
NK087(shu)007:163: cho ga bya ba sgom pa'i 'phrang /
NK087(shu)007:164: bsgral bya sgrol byed sgrol mkhan rnams 'khor gsum rnam
NK087(shu)007:165: par mi rtog pa'i rtsis zin pa spyod pa'i srog
NK087(shu)007:167: tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhal zas mchod pa'i lung //
NK087(shu)007:168: zhes sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang sgrub par byed pa la tshogs gnyis bsags dgos te /
NK087(shu)007:169: tshogs snga mas phyi ma rdzogs pa'i nyer len du 'gro ba ni /
NK087(shu)007:170: gsang sngags thabs la mkhas pas 'dod yon lam byed tshogs kyi mchod pa yin te /
NK087(shu)007:171: de yang tshogs rdzas kyi yo byad thams cad tshogsa
NK087(shu)007:172: pas lha rnams la mchod pa bar med du 'khor
NK087(shu)007:175: zhal la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams zasa kyi mchoda
NK087(shu)007:176: pas dgyes shing tshim par bltas pas dngos grub dam
NK087(shu)007:178: rgya gar du tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
NK087(shu)007:181: gser srang lnga brgya'i rin thang du bcal ba'i yo
NK087(shu)007:182: byad rnams drod tshad dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pho
NK087(shu)007:183: mo brda dang brda'i lan la mkhas pas tshogs pa
NK087(shu)007:184: mang nyung la dpag nas pho tshogs dang mo tshogs
NK087(shu)007:185: zhes btags la / don du tshogs kyi nye rgyu'i
NK087(shu)007:186: spyod pa la brten nas tshogs gnyis kyi 'bras bu
NK087(shu)007:190: ma d+aa na gtsor gyur tshogs rdzas gang 'dzoms pa tsam gyis mchod pa ni longs spyod do //
NK087(shu)007:192: dbang bskur dngos grub len pa sgrub chen lung /
NK087(shu)007:193: zhes pa mthar thug gi 'bras bu dus mi ring bar myur du 'grub par 'dod na /
NK087(shu)007:194: rang rgyud smin byed dbang gi bya ba rnams rdo
NK087(shu)007:195: rje slob dpon dang dbang rdzas sogs rgyu rkyen tshogs
NK087(shu)007:196: pas bskur nas / 'dod pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'dir
NK087(shu)007:197: dngos su 'grub par byed pa'i thabs spyir btang min
NK087(shu)007:198: par lam khyad par can la zhugs shing dang du
NK087(shu)007:199: len pas de'i re 'bras tshe 'dir thob nas dbang
NK087(shu)007:200: bskur bas sgrub pa chen po zhes btags pa yin
NK087(shu)007:201: pas bskur nas / zhing / dbye na gsang snying las /
NK087(shu)007:202: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
NK087(shu)007:203: de ma thag pa bzhi pa ste //
NK087(shu)007:204: zhes spyir dbang la rnam pa bzhi gsungs shing /
NK087(shu)007:205: ma 'ongs pa na 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i sa bon rgyud la thebs /
NK087(shu)007:206: de bskur bar byed par bsnyen bsgrub yan lag rnam
NK087(shu)007:207: bzhi'i cho ga'i yan lag ma nyams par ldan pas
NK087(shu)007:208: dngos grub blang nas thun mong dang mchog gi dngos
NK087(shu)007:209: grub tshe 'dir thob pa la cig car ba dang
NK087(shu)007:210: / de las ldog pa'i dbang po 'bring rtul rnams bar do rnam pa gsum gang rung dang /
NK087(shu)007:211: tshe phyi mar mchog gi dngos grub la sbyor ba yin no //
NK087(shu)007:212: de ltar lung bdun gyi dang pos lta ba gtan la 'beb /
NK087(shu)007:213: gnyis gsum bzhis sgom pa'i rim pa ston /
NK087(shu)007:214: lnga pa gzhan don drug pas sgrub pa'i spyod pa /
NK087(shu)007:215: bdun pas mthar thug gi 'bras bu grub tshul bstan
NK087(shu)007:216: pas gsang sngags spyi yi sdom de tsam du 'dus
NK087(shu)007:217: par bstan pa'o // de ltar mkha' lding bung ba yi //
NK087(shu)007:218: rjes bsnyegs dpe mtshungs bkod 'di ni //
NK087(shu)007:219: bskul ba po dag dgongs pa nyid //
NK087(shu)007:220: ma ldog sems dag'i don ltar brjod //
NK087(shu)007:221: deng dus mkhas las blun po rnams //
NK087(shu)007:222: lhag pa'i dpe don dngos gyur 'dir //
NK087(shu)007:223: nongs mchis mkhas rnams bzod bzhes la //
NK087(shu)007:224: dge dngos byang chen rgyu ru bsngo //
NK087(shu)007:225: thos pas shes rab rgya mtsho yis //
NK087(shu)007:226: bsam pa'i grub gzings lags bskyod de //
NK087(shu)007:227: bsgom pa ded dpon chen po yis //
NK087(shu)007:228: rnam mkhyen rin chen lon par shog /mchog gsum thugs rje'i nyi 'od kyis //
NK087(shu)007:229: zer phreng phyogs brgyar rab 'phro bas //
NK087(shu)007:230: blo gsal pad+mo rab rgyas te //
NK087(shu)007:231: ye shes snang ba 'bar gyur cig /de ltar lung
NK087(shu)007:232: a nu yo ga lung bdun gyi gzhung 'grel 'chad
NK087(shu)007:233: thabs cung zad phye ba 'di ni /
NK087(shu)007:234: rgyud don lung rig smra ba dge bshes zhe chen
NK087(shu)007:235: mchog sprul rin po che bstan 'dzin 'phel rgyas dang
NK087(shu)007:236: / dge sbyong sngags ram chos dbang zung gis lha
NK087(shu)007:237: rdzas dang rin 'khor gyi skyes bcas bskul ma gnang
NK087(shu)007:238: bar brten sh+aakya'i dge bsnyen ma rmong brtul phrin las
NK087(shu)007:239: chos sgron gyis shing bya mgo zla ba'i dkar phyogs
NK087(shu)007:240: kyi rgyal ba dang po'i thun gseng shar mar spel
NK087(shu)007:241: ba 'dis kyang 'gro kun thos bsam sgom pa'i 'bras
NK087(shu)007:242: bu mngon du rtogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig //
